message.raw: Change NUM_MIX_COMPONENTS to NUM_MIX_COMPONENTS_DEFAULT for clarity. Change varFloor to be passed to GMTK only if either specified (with or without GMM), or using mixture models with no varFloor specified, in which case it passes a value of 0.001.
